CustomField.description: Used for Playbooks to define Direct vs Complex
CustomField.formula: IF( OR( ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'Ambassador'), ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'Bennie'), ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'Bing'), ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'Bing SEO'), ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'Bing PPC'), ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'Calendly'), ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'ChatGPT'), ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'Circle Surrogacy'), ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'Claude'), ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'Client Referral'), ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'Coastal Paternity'), ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'Consumer Affairs'), ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'CoPilot'), ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'Direct'), ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'Doctor Referral'), ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'eComm (Americord)'), ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'Employee Referral'), ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'External Referral'), ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'Family Member'), ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'Gemini'), ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'Genesis Group'), ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'Google'), ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'Google: SEO'), ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'Google PPC'), ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'Grok'), ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'Hospital Donation Program'), ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'Impact'), ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'Lifetime Upgrade EC'), ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'Lifetime Upgrade LP'), ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'Lifetime Upgrade OS'), ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'Live Chat'), ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'OOH'), ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'Ovia'), ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'Perplexity'), ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'Reddit'), ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'Returning Client'), ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'Tinyhood'), ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'Townsquare - Display'), ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'VeryWellHealth'), ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'Yahoo') ) , "Direct", "Complex")
CustomField.label: Sale Type: Direct or Complex
